Summary: Saw orange lights appear. First just one but then it formed a line of 3 seperate lights.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Avra Valley
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in backyard with a friend around 9pm when an orange light appeared over mountains to east. It then turned into a line of three lights and then suddenly disappeared. The lights also showed up a couple more times briefly for around a min before going away completely.
